mc.name: Rock Jockey
mc.oracleText:
You can't play Rock Jockey if you played a land this turn.
You can't play lands if you played Rock Jockey this turn.
mc.printedText:
You can't play Rock Jockey if you played a land this turn.
You can't play lands if you played Rock Jockey this turn.
mc.flavorText: Goblins don't know much about physics, but they know lots about falling and rocks.

mc.name: Dispersal Shield
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell if its converted mana cost is less than or equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell if its converted mana cost is less than or equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.
mc.flavorText: "Maybe next time."

mc.name: Alpha Status
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each other creature in play that shares a creature type with it.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each other creature in play that shares a creature type with it.
mc.flavorText: The best leaders are made by their followers.

mc.name: Dragonstalker
mc.oracleText: Flying, protection from Dragons
mc.printedText: Flying, protection from Dragons
mc.flavorText:
"When the skies are filled with flames, the brave shall step forward to quench them."
--Order prophecy

mc.name: Cabal Interrogator
mc.oracleText: {X}{B}, {T}: Target player reveals X cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.
mc.printedText: {X}{B}, {T}: Target player reveals X cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.

mc.name: Exiled Doomsayer
mc.oracleText: All morph costs cost {2} more. (This doesn't affect the cost to play creatures face down.)
mc.printedText: All morph costs cost {2} more. (This doesn't affect the cost to play creatures face down.)
mc.flavorText: He's desperate to hold back the future because he has seen it.

mc.name: Unburden
mc.oracleText:
Target player discards two cards.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Target player discards two cards.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card from your hand: Draw a card.)
mc.flavorText: Cabal initiates enter training full of hopes and fears. They graduate with neither.

mc.name: Bladewing the Risen
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Bladewing the Risen comes into play, you may return target Dragon permanent card from your graveyard to play.
{B}{R}: Dragon creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Bladewing the Risen comes into play, you may return target Dragon card from your graveyard to play.
{B}{R}: All Dragons get +1/+1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Zealous Inquisitor
mc.oracleText: {1}{W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Zealous Inquisitor this turn is dealt to target creature instead.
mc.printedText: {1}{W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Zealous Inquisitor this turn is dealt to target creature instead.
mc.flavorText: "I only return what rightly belongs to another."

mc.name: Frontline Strategist
mc.oracleText:
Morph {W} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Frontline Strategist is turned face up, prevent all combat damage non-Soldier creatures would deal this turn.
mc.printedText:
Morph {W} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Frontline Strategist is turned face up, prevent all combat damage non-Soldiers would deal this turn.

mc.name: Frozen Solid
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
When damage is dealt to enchanted creature, destroy it.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
When damage is dealt to enchanted creature, destroy it.

mc.name: Treetop Scout
mc.oracleText: Treetop Scout can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
mc.printedText: Treetop Scout can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
mc.flavorText: At home among the swaying, supple branches of the treetops, some scouts live their entire lives never touching ground.

mc.name: Carrion Feeder
mc.oracleText:
Carrion Feeder can't block.
Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.
mc.printedText:
Carrion Feeder can't block.
Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.
mc.flavorText: Stinking of rot, it leaps between gravestones in search of its next meal.

mc.name: Edgewalker
mc.oracleText: Cleric spells you play cost {W}{B} less to play. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. (For example, if you play a Cleric with mana cost {1}{W}, it costs {1} to play.)
mc.printedText: Cleric spells you play cost {W}{B} less to play. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. (For example, if you play a Cleric with mana cost {1}{W}, it costs {1} to play.)

mc.name: Zombie Cutthroat
mc.oracleText: Morph-Pay 5 life. (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
mc.printedText: Morph--Pay 5 life. (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
mc.flavorText: The single-mindedness of a zombie, the cunning of an assassin.

mc.name: Decree of Pain
mc.oracleText:
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.
Cycling {3}{B}{B}
When you cycle Decree of Pain, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.
Cycling {3}{B}{B}
When you cycle Decree of Pain, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

mc.name: Goblin Brigand
mc.oracleText: Goblin Brigand attacks each turn if able.
mc.printedText: Goblin Brigand attacks each turn if able.
mc.flavorText: After the Skirk Ridge collapsed, the goblins erected a system of ropes and pulleys to hold up what was left.

mc.name: Torrent of Fire
mc.oracleText: Torrent of Fire deals damage equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Torrent of Fire deals damage equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Dragon fire melts any instrument designed to measure it.

mc.name: Dragon Breath
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has haste.
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or more comes into play, you may return Dragon Breath from your graveyard to play attached to that creature.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature has haste.
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or more comes into play, you may return Dragon Breath from your graveyard to play enchanting that creature.

mc.name: Krosan Warchief
mc.oracleText:
Beast spells you play cost {1} less to play.
{1}{G}: Regenerate target Beast.
mc.printedText:
Beast spells you play cost {1} less to play.
{1}{G}: Regenerate target Beast.
mc.flavorText: It turns prey into predator.

mc.oracleText: Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
mc.printedText: Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card from your hand: Search your library for a forest card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
mc.flavorText: Tall as a tree and probably related.

mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {G}{G}{G} to your mana pool.
Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

mc.name: Accelerated Mutation
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.
mc.flavorText: Its food just got a lot smaller and its stomach a lot bigger.

mc.name: Claws of Wirewood
mc.oracleText:
Claws of Wirewood deals 3 damage to each creature with flying and each player.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Claws of Wirewood deals 3 damage to each creature with flying and each player.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card from your hand: Draw a card.)
mc.flavorText: They say the forest has eyes. They never mention its claws.

mc.name: One with Nature
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Siege-Gang Commander
mc.oracleText:
When Siege-Gang Commander comes into play, put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens into play.
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
When Siege-Gang Commander comes into play, put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens into play.
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Misguided Rage
mc.oracleText: Target player sacrifices a permanent.
mc.printedText: Target player sacrifices a permanent.
mc.flavorText: Only when the anger passed did Varv realize he had burned down his home, destroyed his weapons, and killed his friend Furt.

mc.name: Upwelling
mc.oracleText: Mana pools don't empty at the end of phases or turns. (This effect stops mana burn.)
mc.printedText: Mana pools don't empty at the end of phases or turns. (This effect stops mana burn.)
mc.flavorText: Once again, Kamahl felt the full force of the Mirari's pull, but he had learned much since the last time.

mc.name: Xantid Swarm
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Xantid Swarm attacks, defending player can't play spells this turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Xantid Swarm attacks, defending player can't play spells this turn.
mc.flavorText: When they land on you, all you can think about is tearing them off.

mc.name: Form of the Dragon
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Form of the Dragon deals 5 damage to target creature or player.
At the end of each turn, your life total becomes 5.
Creatures without flying can't attack you.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Form of the Dragon deals 5 damage to target creature or player.
At the end of each turn, your life total becomes 5.
Creatures without flying can't attack you.

mc.name: Goblin Psychopath
mc.oracleText: Whenever Goblin Psychopath attacks or blocks, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, the next time it would deal combat damage this turn, it deals that damage to you instead.
mc.printedText: Whenever Goblin Psychopath attacks or blocks, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, the next time it would deal combat damage this turn, it deals that damage to you instead.
mc.flavorText: The destruction he causes is nothing next to the chaos in his mind.

mc.name: Dragon Mage
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Dragon Mage deals combat damage to a player, each player discards his or her hand and draws seven cards.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Dragon Mage deals combat damage to a player, each player discards his or her hand and draws seven cards.
mc.flavorText: "You'll bend to my will--with or without your precious sanity."

mc.name: Dimensional Breach
mc.oracleText: Remove all permanents from the game. As long as any of those cards remain removed from the game, at the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns one of the removed cards he or she owns to play.
mc.printedText: Remove all permanents from the game. As long as any of those cards remain removed from the game, at the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns one of the removed cards he or she owns to play.

mc.name: Trap Digger
mc.oracleText:
{2}{W}, {T}: Put a trap counter on target land you control.
Sacrifice a land with a trap counter on it: Trap Digger deals 3 damage to target attacking creature without flying.
mc.printedText:
{2}{W}, {T}: Put a trap counter on target land you control.
Sacrifice a land with a trap counter on it: Trap Digger deals 3 damage to target attacking creature without flying.

Morph {1}{U}{U} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Riptide Survivor is turned face up, discard two cards, then draw three cards.

Morph {1}{U}{U} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Riptide Survivor is turned face up, discard two cards from your hand, then draw three cards.

Enchant creature

Goblin spells you play cost {1} less to play.
Goblin creatures you control have haste.
mc.printedText:
Goblin spells you play cost {1} less to play.

mc.name: Extra Arms
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Whenever enchanted creature attacks, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"Perhaps extra heads would have served them better."
--Foothill guide

Morph {2}{G}{G} (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

mc.oracleText:
Forests you control are 1/1 green Elf creatures that are still lands.
{1}{G}, Sacrifice an Elf: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Forests you control are 1/1 green Elf creatures that are still lands.

mc.name: Day of the Dragons
mc.oracleText:
When Day of the Dragons comes into play, remove all creatures you control from the game. Then put that many 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying into play.
When Day of the Dragons leaves play, sacrifice all Dragons you control. Then return the removed cards to play under your control.
mc.printedText:
When Day of the Dragons comes into play, remove all creatures you control from the game. Then put that many 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying into play.
When Day of the Dragons leaves play, sacrifice all Dragons you control. Then return the removed cards to play under your control.

mc.name: Parallel Thoughts
mc.oracleText:
When Parallel Thoughts comes into play, search your library for seven cards, remove them from the game in a face-down pile, and shuffle that pile. Then shuffle your library.
If you would draw a card, you may instead put the top card of the pile you removed into your hand.
mc.printedText:
When Parallel Thoughts comes into play, search your library for seven cards, remove them from the game in a face-down pile, and shuffle that pile. Then shuffle your library.
If you would draw a card, you may instead put the top card of the pile you removed into your hand.

mc.name: Long-Term Plans
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a card, shuffle your library, then put that card third from the top.
mc.printedText: Search your library for a card, shuffle your library, then put that card third from the top.
mc.flavorText: "Wait, it'll come to me in a minute."

mc.name: Thundercloud Elemental
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{3}{U}: Tap all creatures with toughness 2 or less.
{3}{U}: All other creatures lose flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{3}{U}: Tap all creatures with toughness 2 or less.
{3}{U}: All other creatures lose flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Some days it's better to stay inside.

mc.name: Final Punishment
mc.oracleText: Target player loses life equal to the damage already dealt to him or her this turn.
mc.printedText: Target player loses life equal to the damage already dealt to him or her this turn.
mc.flavorText: The pain of a lifetime--every scrape, illness, and bruise--condensed into a single moment.

Flying

mc.printedText: Whenever Nefashu attacks, up to five target creatures each get -1/-1 until end of turn.

mc.printedText: Rain of Blades deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.
mc.flavorText: Some say they are the weapons of heroes fallen in battle, eager for one last chance at glory.

Soldier creatures you control get +1/+2.

Defender (This creature can't attack.)

(Walls can't attack.)

mc.name: Call to the Grave
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Zombie creature.
At end of turn, if no creatures are in play, sacrifice Call to the Grave.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Zombie creature.
At end of turn, if no creatures are in play, sacrifice Call to the Grave.

mc.name: Lingering Death
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
At the end of enchanted creature's controller's turn, that player sacrifices that creature.
mc.printedText: The controller of enchanted creature sacrifices it at the end of his or her turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Looks bad. I don't know if he'll make it through the night."
--Cabal cleric

mc.name: Rush of Knowledge
mc.oracleText: Draw cards equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.
mc.printedText: Draw cards equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.
mc.flavorText:
"Limitless power is glorious until you gain limitless understanding."
--Ixidor, reality sculptor

mc.name: Metamorphose
mc.oracleText: Put target permanent an opponent controls on top of its owner's library. That opponent may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from his or her hand into play.
mc.printedText: Put target permanent an opponent controls on top of its owner's library. That opponent may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from his or her hand into play.
mc.flavorText: If it's not one thing, it's another.

mc.name: Skulltap
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Skulltap, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
mc.printedText:
As an additional cost to play Skulltap, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
mc.flavorText:
"Finally, a use for that head of yours."
--Braids, dementia summoner

mc.name: Fierce Empath
mc.oracleText: When Fierce Empath comes into play, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 6 or more, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: When Fierce Empath comes into play, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 6 or more, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Forgotten Ancient
mc.oracleText:
Whenever a player plays a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.
mc.printedText:
Whenever a player plays a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.
mc.flavorText: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.

mc.name: Fatal Mutation
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature is turned face up, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: When enchanted creature is turned face up, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText:
"You wear that shell as a mask. Now it's your coffin."

Haste

Haste

mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 as long as it's a Zombie. Otherwise, it gets -3/-3.

mc.printedText: Whenever a player plays a spell with converted mana cost 3 or less, Pyrostatic Pillar deals 2 damage to that player.

mc.name: Dawn Elemental
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Dawn Elemental.
mc.printedText:
Flying

Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Storm (When you play this spell, copy it for each spell played before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
